source.additionalInfo:
IMRID

       5281
    

Dementia Indicator ID

      27.3
    

Name

	Estimated population-based prevalence of depression
	

Original Submeasure

      Estimated population-based prevalence of depression
    

Data Type Representation

        Numerical
    

Rationale

      
    

Definition

      Number of persons with depressive disorder (major depressive disorder/depressive episode or dysthymia) in the last year.

		Major depressive disorder / depressive episode involves symptoms such as depressed mood, loss of interest and enjoyment, and decreased energy; depending on the number and severity of symptoms, a depressive episode can be categorized as mild, moderate, or severe

    

Preferred data sources
Mental health atlas

Preferred data sources
WHO Global Health Estimates

Method of estimation

	Prevalence of depressive disorder collected by Global Health Estimates
